title: About KDM Associates - Our Story & Mission

metadata.title: About KDM Associates - Our Story & Mission
metadata.metaDescription: Learn about KDM Associates, our mission, values, and 25+ years of experience helping manufacturers achieve quality excellence.
metadata.ogDescription: Our story and mission in quality management.

sections.heading: Our Story
sections.content: Founded in 1998, KDM Associates began with a simple mission: to help manufacturers achieve quality excellence. Today, we serve clients across aerospace, defense, and manufacturing industries.

sections.heading: Our Mission
sections.content: We are committed to providing expert guidance and practical solutions that help our clients achieve and maintain the highest standards of quality and compliance.
